contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Oguni |JapaneseName= 小国町 |settlement_type= Town |MapImage= Oguni in Yamagata Prefecture.png |Region= [[Tōhoku region|Tōhoku]] |Prefecture= [[Yamagata Prefecture]] |District= [[Nishiokitama District, Yamagata|Nishiokitama District]] |Area_km2= 737.55 |PopDate= February 1, 2008 |Population= 9342 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees = 38 |LatitudeMinutes = 4 |LatitudeSeconds = |LongtitudeDegrees = 139 |LongtitudeMinutes = 45 |LongtitudeSeconds = |Tree= [[Beech]] |Flower= [[Sakura]] |Bird= [[Japanese Bush-warbler]] |SymbolImage= Flag of Oguni Yamagata.JPG |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= 999-1363 |CityHallAddress= 2-70 Ogunikosaka, Oguni-chō, Yamagata-ken |CityHallPhone= 0238-62-2111 |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.oguni.yamagata.jp/ Town of Oguni] }} {{nihongo|'''Oguni'''|小国町|Oguni-machi}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Nishiokitama District, Yamagata|Nishiokitama District]], [[Yamagata Prefecture|Yamagata]], [[Japan]]. As of February 1, 2008, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 9,342 and a [[population density|density]] of 12.7 persons per km². The total area is 737.55 km². ==Transportation== ===Train stations=== * [[East Japan Railway Company|JR East]] **'''[[Yonesaka Line]]''': [[Uzen-Numazawa Station|Uzen-Numazawa]] - [[Isaryō Station|Isaryō]] - [[Uzen-Matsuoka Station|Uzen-Matsuoka]] - [[Oguni Station|Oguni]] ===Major roads=== * [[Route 113 (Japan)|Route 113]] ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.town.oguni.yamagata.jp/ Oguni official website] {{ja icon}} {{Yamagata}} [[Category:Towns in Yamagata Prefecture]] {{Yamagata-geo-stub}}
